uslt:

title: Shadows
uslt:
[00:10.17]Here for the night, in neon lights
[00:10.17]顺应黑夜的邀请
[00:12.74]The darkness invites us
[00:12.74]迎着霓虹灯光，在这里过夜
[00:15.11]We're left to right, don't lose the high
[00:15.11]我们与真理背道而驰，却未失去兴奋
[00:17.77]It's dangerous drowning in the twilight
[00:17.77]沉溺于暮光十分危险
[00:20.30]Electric eyes, you can't deny the thunder inside us
[00:20.30]双眸之间传递着秋波，你不能否认我们之间涌动的轰鸣之声
[00:25.28]Before the night, left to right, love me in the shadows
[00:25.28]在黑夜来临之前，从身体的每个部分，与我在暗影中相爱吧
[00:30.40]You go with shadows and they lose you
[00:30.40]你随着影子离去直到他们失去你
[00:33.62]Oh, the beauty, come home
[00:33.62]喔，那份美感映入眼帘
[00:35.40]Even though we know the night will only last 'till dawn
[00:35.40]尽管我们知道夜晚将随着黎明的到来而消逝
[00:40.90]Oh, it's now or never, fabled fantasy
[00:40.90]喔，把握住现存的那份虚构的幻想
[00:45.58]Even though it only lasts 'till dawn, love me in the shadows
[00:45.58]尽管夜晚将随着黎明的到来而消逝，与我在暗影中相爱吧
[00:58.56]Love me in the shadows
[00:58.56]与我在暗影中相爱吧
[01:08.63]Love me in the shadows
[01:08.63]与我在暗影中缠绵吧
[01:20.94]I wanna be the melody moving inside you
[01:20.94]我想成为你体内律动的旋律
[01:25.93]So carefully, we let the beat open inside the darkness
[01:25.93]所以，我们小心地让节拍在黑暗中响起
[01:31.07]It's you and me, eternity, running until the sunrise
[01:31.07]两人一共，永无休止地奔向黎明
[01:36.10]Before the night, left to right, love me in the shadows
[01:36.10]在黑夜来临之前，从身体的每个部分，与我在暗影中相爱吧
[01:41.08]You go with shadows and they lose you
[01:41.08]你随着影子离去直到他们失去你
[01:44.02]Oh, the beauty, come home
[01:44.02]喔，那份美感映入眼帘
[01:46.15]Even though we know the night will only last 'till dawn
[01:46.15]尽管我们知道夜晚将随着黎明的到来而消逝
[01:51.53]Oh, it's now or never, fabled fantasy
[01:51.53]喔，把握住现存的那份虚构的幻想
[01:56.33]Even though it only lasts 'till dawn, love me in the shadows
[01:56.33]尽管夜晚将随着黎明的到来而消逝，与我在暗影中相爱吧
[02:09.28]Love me in the shadows
[02:09.28]与我在暗影中相爱吧
[02:19.34]Love me in the shadows
[02:19.34]与我在暗影中相爱吧

title: Try Everything
uslt:
[00:00.000]Shakira - Try Everything
[00:00.169]Lyrics by：Mikkel Eriksen、Sia Furler、Tor Erik Hermansen
[00:00.436]Composed by：Mikkel Eriksen、Sia Furler、Tor Erik Hermansen
[00:00.663]Produced by：StarGate
[00:00.663]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[00:04.350]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[00:08.520]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[00:12.680]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[00:15.800]I messed up tonight I lost another fight
[00:15.800]今夜我搞砸了 又一次落败  
[00:19.940]I still mess up but I'll just start again
[00:19.940]深陷困境但我依然会重新开始  
[00:23.860]I keep falling down I keep on hitting the ground
[00:23.860]我总是失败 总是跌倒  
[00:28.120]But I always get up now to see what's next
[00:28.120]而我总能重新站起 迎接崭新的未来  
[00:33.530]Birds don't just fly they fall down and get up
[00:33.530]鸟儿无法振翅高飞 跌落天际却重新展翅  
[00:41.670]Nobody learns without getting it wrong
[00:41.670]不经历失败怎会懂成功的喜悦  
[00:49.330]I won't give up no I won't give in
[00:49.330]我绝不会屈服 绝不会放弃  
[00:52.360]Till I reach the end and then I'll start again
[00:52.360]直到我抵达终点 我会重新出发  
[00:57.190]No I won't leave I wanna try everything
[00:57.190]不 我不会放弃 我只想竭尽全力  
[01:01.250]I wanna try even though I could fail
[01:01.250]即便我注定失败我也想要竭尽全力  
[01:05.910]I won't give up no I won't give in
[01:05.910]我绝不会屈服 绝不会放弃  
[01:09.198]Till I reach the end and then I'll start again
[01:09.198]直到我抵达终点 我会重新出发  
[01:13.628]No I won't leave I wanna try everything
[01:13.628]不 我不会放弃 我只想竭尽全力  
[01:17.827]I wanna try even though I could fail
[01:17.827]即便我注定失败我也想要竭尽全力  
[01:23.447]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[01:26.067]Try everything
[01:26.067]竭尽全力  
[01:27.327]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[01:30.177]Try everything
[01:30.177]竭尽全力  
[01:31.477]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[01:33.927]Try everything
[01:33.927]竭尽全力  
[01:35.597]Oh oh oh oh oooh
[01:39.337]Look how far you've come you filled your heart with love
[01:39.337]看看满怀着爱的你 坚持了多久  
[01:42.987]Baby you've done enough take a deep breath
[01:42.987]你已经受够了 深呼吸  
[01:47.236]Don't beat yourself up don't need to run so fast
[01:47.236]请不要自暴自弃 也不必太快抽离  
[01:51.335]Sometimes we come last but we did our best
[01:51.335]有时我们终能实现梦想只要我们竭尽全力

[02:24.304]I wanna try even though I could fail
[02:24.304]即便我注定失败我也想要竭尽全力

[02:30.044]我也会固执的坚持犯错

[02:37.954]每一天都不会放弃
